DataElement.preferredName: FACIT-D Questionnaire Trial Outcome Index Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated numeric value using the scores from the FACT-G Physical and Functional Well-being subscale and the FACIT-D Diarrhea subscale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Diarrhea Clinical Trial Outcome Index
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that is used to assess how diarrhea affects an individual's life._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The result of an action._A numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number; a number used to select an element of a list, vector, array or other sequence.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Diarrhea
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that is used to assess how diarrhea affects an individual's life.
